descripcion:
In this hands-on session, you learn 
How to deploy an application to a Kubernetes cluster hosted within the IBM Cloud via kubectl commands 
How to scale a deployment and safely roll out an update of your application in Kubernetes 
How to deploy an application via configuration files instead of using the kubectl commands. The configuration file mechanism allows you to have more fine-grained control over all of resources being created within the Kubernetes cluster. 
Difficulty: Easy to Medium
